radiographic_examinations.findings: Tiny dependent left pleural effusion and mild atelectasis in the left lung base. A subtly hypoenhancing mass in the pancreas head, dilatation of the upstream main pancreatic duct up to 0.9 cm, and atrophy of the pancreas body and tail are similar. A rim enhancing fluid collection in the region of the pancreas tail measuring 5.8 x 1.8 cm, previously 6.5 x 2.5 cm. A 1.3 cm enlarged periportal lymph node is unchanged.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The rim enhancing fluid collection is mildly smaller at 5.8 x 1.8 cm, previously 6.5 x 2.5 cm.
